import { useState } from "react"; export const CarTool = (props) =>{ const [carForm, setCarForm ] = useState({ make: '', model: '', year: 1990, color: '', price: 2300, }); const change = e => { setCarForm({ ...carForm, [ e.target.name ]: e.target.value, [ e.target.name ]: e.target.type === 'number' ? parseInt(e.target.value, 10) : e.target.value, }); } console.log(carForm); return( <>

Car Tool

{props.cars.map(car => ) }
ID MAKE MODEL YEAR COLOR PRICE
{car.id} {car.make} {car.model} {car.year} {car.color} {car.price}


       
) };
